verses.verse: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, Nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
For (Ps. 37:18; (Nah. 1:7; John 10:14; 2 Tim. 2:19)) the LORD knows the way of the righteous, But the way of the ungodly shall perish.
(The Messiah’s Triumph and Kingdom) Why (Acts 4:25, 26) do the nations rage, And the people plot a vain thing?
The kings of the earth set themselves, And the ((Matt. 12:14; 26:3, 4, 59-66; 27:1, 2; Mark 3:6; 11:18)) rulers take counsel together, Against the LORD and against His ((John 1:41)) Anointed, saying,
“Let (Luke 19:14) us break Their bonds in pieces And cast away Their cords from us.”
He who sits in the heavens (Ps. 37:13) shall laugh; The Lord shall hold them in derision.
Then He shall speak to them in His wrath, And distress them in His deep displeasure:
“Yet I have set My King On My holy hill of Zion.”
